title: Fix PIX QR code not displaying in checkout

requirements.text: Debug and fix the PIX QR code display issue in the checkout flow. The QR code should be visible when users select PIX as the payment method.

quotes: o qr code pix nao ta aparecendo

acceptanceCriteria: PIX QR code image renders correctly on the checkout page
QR code is scannable and contains valid payment payload
Copy-to-clipboard functionality works for PIX key and payload
QR code displays properly on both desktop and mobile viewports

requirements.text: Verify the PixQrCodeDisplay component is properly integrated in CheckoutPage and receives correct payment data from the PagBank payment flow.
acceptanceCriteria: PixQrCodeDisplay component receives valid PIX payload data
Payment status updates correctly after QR code is displayed
Error states are handled gracefully if payment data is missing

requirements.text: Ensure the PIX payload generation in pixPayload.ts creates valid BR Code format with correct CRC16 checksum for QR code scanning.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated PIX payload follows EMV QR Code specification
Payload can be successfully scanned by banking apps

constraints: Do not modify the backend payment configuration logic
Maintain compatibility with existing PagBank integration
Preserve the current checkout flow and payment status tracking
nonGoals: Changing the overall checkout page design
